title: About
text: Laboratorio di elettroencefalografia: guida - Mattia Doro (mattia.doro (at) unipd.it)

title: Electroencephalografic laboratory: guide
text:
Preparing the Laboratory
What to prepare before the participant’s arrival.


Montage
How the electrode montage works.


Impedance Test: ActiCap Control
How to verify that the montage has been done correctly.


Signal Visualization and Recording: BrainVision Recorder
A glance at the signal, and we are ready to start the experiment.


Laboratory Cleanup
Keeping the laboratory tidy (and taking care not to damage the equipment during cleaning).

title: Lab EEG - DPSS
text: title: “BrainVision Recorder” author: “Mattia Doro” date: “2023-07-31” output: html_document:

title: Lab EEG - DPSS
text:
Recording
Open Brain Vision Recorder software.

Click on File, then on “Open Workspace”. Choose now the workspace, that is located in C:/Vision/Mattia/ (extension: .rwksp). Differently from Acticap Control software for impedence check, you do not need to load a channel definition now.

title: Laboratorio di elettroencefalografia: guida
text:
Preparare il laboratorio
Cosa preparare prima dell’arrivo del partecipante.


Montaggio
Come funziona il montaggio degli elettrodi.


Test delle impedenze: ActiCap Control
Come verificare che il montaggio sia eseguito correttamente.


Visualizzare e registrare il segnale: BrainVision Recorder
Un’occhiata al segnale e siamo pronti ad iniziare l’esperimento.


Pulizia del laboratorio
Manteniamo il laboratorio in ordine (e impegnamoci a non danneggiare le attrezzature durante le pulizie).
